articles.author: Richard Henderson, Rob Verdonck
articles.title: Gold, Silver Hold Losses as Stocks Take a Breather: Markets Wrap - Bloomberg
articles.description: Gold and silver extended their plunge from record highs, while Asian stocks slid after a rally on Wall Street showed signs of fatigue.
articles.content:
Gold and silver extended their plunge from record highs, while Asian stocks slid after a rally on Wall Street showed signs of fatigue.
Gold fell as much as 2.9% before paring losses, after suffering… [+131 chars]
